data.name: XGraphicStorageHandler
desc: interface for loading, saving and serializing of XGraphic objects to a document storage

methods.name: createInputStream
desc: create an input stream from the input graphic

methods.name: loadGraphic
desc: load a graphic defined by the URL from the storage

methods.name: loadGraphicFromOutputStream
desc: load a graphic from the output stream

methods.name: saveGraphic
desc: save the graphic to the storage and return the URL reference to its location inside the storage

methods.name: saveGraphicByName
desc: save the graphic to the storage with a requested name and return the URL reference to its location inside the storage and the mime type of the format that the graphic was saved to as an output parameter
